name: Plaza Premium Lounge
shortDesc: Relax and refresh at the Plaza Premium Lounge. Open to all passengers, the lounge offers complimentary food and beverages

name: CAPSULE TRANSIT BY CONTAINER HOTEL
shortDesc: With the establishment of the Capsule by Container Hotel at klia2, transit passengers at the klia2 airport can grab a few hours of shut-eye on a bed instead of lounging in the public areas. You can enjoy a good rest here because the check-in counters at the Departure Hall are just 8 minutes walking distance away.

name: RESTORAN ALI MAJU
shortDesc: Enjoy Southern Indian food that has a Malaysian twist here.
